segments.text: I've been looking forward to visiting your factory .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Actually , you'll know our products better after the visit . I'll show you around and explain the operations as we go along .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Maybe we could start with the Design Department . And then we could look at the production line .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How much do you spend on design development every year .
segments.speaker: S2
